content:
Ná»™i dung | Content:
ğŸ¯ Má»¥c tiÃªu tá»•ng quan âš™ï¸ Tá»± Ä‘á»™ng hÃ³a quy trÃ¬nh ETL ğŸ“Š Há»— trá»£ truy váº¥n vÃ  trá»±c quan hÃ³a ğŸ¯ Má»¥c tiÃªu tá»•ng quan XÃ¢y dá»±ng pipeline xá»­ lÃ½ dá»¯ liá»‡u sá»­ dá»¥ng cÃ¡c dá»‹ch vá»¥ AWS: S3, Glue, vÃ  Athena. Thiáº¿t káº¿ kiáº¿n trÃºc linh hoáº¡t, cÃ³ kháº£ nÄƒng má»Ÿ rá»™ng, dá»… dÃ ng tÃ­ch há»£p thÃªm dá»‹ch vá»¥. Build a data processing pipeline using AWS services: S3, Glue, and Athena.

âš™ï¸ Tá»± Ä‘á»™ng hÃ³a quy trÃ¬nh ETL ToÃ n bá»™ quy trÃ¬nh ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) sáº½ Ä‘Æ°á»£c tá»± Ä‘á»™ng hÃ³a báº±ng AWS Glue vÃ  cÃ¡c tÃ¡c vá»¥ lá»‹ch trÃ¬nh. Äáº£m báº£o xá»­ lÃ½ dá»¯ liá»‡u Ä‘á»‹nh ká»³, giáº£m thiá»ƒu lá»—i do thao tÃ¡c thá»§ cÃ´ng. The entire ETL process will be automated using AWS Glue and scheduled jobs.

ğŸ“Š Há»— trá»£ truy váº¥n vÃ  trá»±c quan hÃ³a Dá»¯ liá»‡u sau xá»­ lÃ½ Ä‘Æ°á»£c lÆ°u trá»¯ trÃªn S3 vÃ  truy váº¥n báº±ng Athena thÃ´ng qua SQL. title: Viáº¿t mÃ£ Python cho Lambda
content:
7.2 Viáº¿t mÃ£ Python cho Lambda Sá»­ dá»¥ng thÆ° viá»‡n boto3 Ä‘á»ƒ gá»i AWS Glue APIs:
import boto3 import logging import time logger = logging.getLogger() logger.setLevel(logging.INFO) glue = boto3.client('glue') def lambda_handler(event, context): logger.info("ğŸ” Lambda triggered") crawler_name = 'salesdatacrawler' try: glue.start_crawler(Name=crawler_name) logger.info(f"âœ… Successfully started crawler: {crawler_name}") except glue.exceptions.CrawlerRunningException: logger.warning(f"âš ï¸ Crawler {crawler_name} is already running.") except Exception as e: logger.error(f"âŒ Failed to start crawler {crawler_name}: {str(e)}") return { 'statusCode': 500, 'body': f"Error starting crawler {crawler_name}: {str(e)}" } logger.info(f"â³ Waiting for crawler {crawler_name} to complete...") while True: crawler_state = glue.get_crawler(Name=crawler_name)['Crawler']['State'] if crawler_state == 'READY': logger.info(f"âœ… Crawler {crawler_name} finished.") break time.sleep(10) job_name = 'ProcessJob' try: while True: job_runs = glue.get_job_runs(JobName=job_name, MaxResults=1) if not job_runs['JobRuns']: break current_status = job_runs['JobRuns'][0]['JobRunState'] if current_status in ['RUNNING', 'STARTING', 'STOPPING']: logger.info(f"ğŸ•’ Glue Job {job_name} is currently {current_status}, waiting...") time.sleep(15) else: break logger.info(f"ğŸš€ Starting Glue Job: {job_name}") response = glue.start_job_run(JobName=job_name) job_run_id = response['JobRunId'] except Exception as e: logger.error(f"âŒ Failed to start Glue Job: {str(e)}") return { 'statusCode': 500, 'body': f"Error starting Glue job: {str(e)}" } logger.info(f"â³ Waiting for Glue Job {job_name} to complete...") while True: job_status = glue.get_job_run(JobName=job_name, RunId=job_run_id) state = job_status['JobRun']['JobRunState'] logger.info(f"ğŸ§ª Glue Job status: {state}") if state in ['SUCCEEDED', 'FAILED', 'STOPPED']: break time.sleep(15) if state != 'SUCCEEDED': logger.error(f"âŒ Glue Job ended with status: {state}") return { 'statusCode': 500, 'body': f"Glue Job failed or stopped with status: {state}" } logger.info(f"âœ… Glue Job {job_name} completed successfully.") second_crawler = 'salesdatacrawler_processed' try: glue.start_crawler(Name=second_crawler) logger.info(f"âœ… Successfully started crawler: {second_crawler}") return { 'statusCode': 200, 'body': f"Workflow completed. Crawler {second_crawler} started." } except Exception as e: logger.error(f"âŒ Failed to start second crawler: {str(e)}") return { 'statusCode': 500, 'body': f"Error starting second crawler {second_crawler}: {str(e)}" } Äá»«ng quÃªn log tráº¡ng thÃ¡i Ä‘á»ƒ kiá»ƒm tra trong CloudWatch Logs.

title: Viáº¿t script ETL
content:
4.2 Viáº¿t script ETL Trong script Python (Spark):
Äá»c dá»¯ liá»‡u tá»« báº£ng sales_data_raw Äá»•i tÃªn cá»™t náº¿u cáº§n (order_id â†’ id, v.v.) Ã‰p kiá»ƒu dá»¯ liá»‡u phÃ¹ há»£p (vÃ­ dá»¥: date, float) Ghi ra s3://sales-data-bucket-2025/processed/ dÆ°á»›i dáº¡ng Parquet hoáº·c CSV import sys from pyspark.context import SparkContext from awsglue.utils import getResolvedOptions from awsglue.context import GlueContext from awsglue.job import Job from pyspark.sql.functions import col, trim, regexp_replace, round from awsglue.dynamicframe import DynamicFrame args = getResolvedOptions(sys.argv, ['JOB_NAME']) sc = SparkContext() glueContext = GlueContext(sc) spark = glueContext.spark_session job = Job(glueContext) job.init(args['JOB_NAME'], args) input_dyf = glueContext.create_dynamic_frame.from_catalog( database="sales_analysis_db", table_name="sales_dataset_raw" ) df = input_dyf.toDF() for col_name in df.columns: if df.schema[col_name].dataType.simpleString() == 'string': df = df.withColumn( col_name, trim( regexp_replace( regexp_replace(col(col_name), '^"|"$', ''), '\s+', ' ' ) ) ) if 'price' in df.columns and 'quantity' in df.columns: df = df.withColumn("revenue", round(col("price") * col("quantity"), 2)) output_dyf = DynamicFrame.fromDF(df, glueContext, "output_dyf") output_path = "s3://sales-data-bucket-2025/processed/" glueContext.write_dynamic_frame.from_options( frame=output_dyf, connection_type="s3", connection_options={ "path": output_path, "partitionKeys": [] }, format="csv" ) glueContext.write_dynamic_frame.from_options( frame=output_dyf, connection_type="s3", connection_options={"path": "s3://sales-data-bucket-2025/processed/"}, format="csv" ) job.commit() NÃªn dÃ¹ng Ä‘á»‹nh dáº¡ng Parquet Ä‘á»ƒ tá»‘i Æ°u chi phÃ­ & hiá»‡u nÄƒng khi query báº±ng Athena.

Kiá»ƒm tra báº£ng: VÃ o Glue Console â†’ Databases â†’ sales_analysis_db Äáº£m báº£o báº£ng sales_data_raw Ä‘Ãºng vá»›i dá»¯ liá»‡u tá»« sales_dataset.csv. Trigger Configuration: S3 Bucket: s3/sales-data-bucket-2025 Event types: All Object create events Sau Ä‘Ã³ nháº¥n Add Trigger Test thá»­ Lambda vÃ  Trigger ThÃªm file má»›i vÃ o S3 salesdatacrawler báº¯t Ä‘áº§u cháº¡y salesdatacrawler cháº¡y xong Cáº¥u hÃ¬nh Amazon EventBridge Ä‘á»ƒ cÃ¡c hÃ nh Ä‘á»™ng khÃ¡c cÅ©ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c kÃ­ch hoáº¡t sau khi crawl dá»¯ liá»‡u VÃ o trang chá»§ Amazon EventBridge Chá»n Create rule Chá»n Event Pattern lÃ  JSON { "detail": { "crawlerName": ["salesdatacrawler"], "state": ["SUCCEEDED"] } } Sau Ä‘Ã³ cáº¥u hÃ¬nh nhÆ° áº£nh, role lÃ  LambdaRole Test láº¡i thÃ¬ sau khi Crawl xong láº§n 1 thÃ¬ sáº½ tá»± Ä‘á»™ng cháº¡y ETL Job

title: Má»¥c Ä‘Ã­ch vÃ  á»¨ng dá»¥ng
content:
Ná»™i dung:
ğŸŒ Táº¡i sao dÃ¹ng AWS cho Data Pipeline? ğŸ“Œ TrÆ°á»ng há»£p sá»­ dá»¥ng thá»±c táº¿ ğŸš€ Kháº£ nÄƒng má»Ÿ rá»™ng trong tÆ°Æ¡ng lai ğŸŒ Táº¡i sao dÃ¹ng AWS cho Data Pipeline?
